pageContext.claim: “'The Chinese say (about Trump’s Trade War & Tariffs), ‘he brought us to the table.’ This is the most prosperous economy the world has ever seen, and it’s going to be a very prosperous economy.' Jamie Dimon on @60Minutes Thank you President Trump & the Republican Party!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump leaves off the rest of the quote by Jamie Dimon, the chief executive of JPMorgan Chase, which would show that he was not talking about Trump's handling of the economy or even the United States but the global economy over a long period of time: "There've been like 50 or 60 international crises since World War II. Only one really affected the global economy in the short run [the oil crisis of 1973]. This is the most prosperous economy the world has ever seen and It's going to be a very prosperous economy for the next 100 years."
